text:
Raskolnikov felt irritable impatience. He calculated when Porfiry left. 

He hurried out of the room. The air felt heavy. 

He needed to know what Porfiry had said. 

“Did he suspect me?” he wondered. 

Anxiety gnawed at him as he stepped into the street.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov, feeling irritable and impatient, hurriedly left the room after calculating that Porfiry had already left.
